SourceProxy.label: Extract Selection Range (internal)
SourceProxy.name: ExtractSelectionRange
SourceProxy.Documentation: This filter extracts the range of a given set of cells or points given a selection. The selection can be obtained from a rubber-band selection (either point, cell, visible or in a frustum) and passed to the filter or specified by providing an ID list. This is an internal filter.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: The input from which the selection is extracted.

InputProperty.name: Selection
InputProperty.Documentation: The input that provides the selection object.

StringVectorProperty.name: ArrayName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property indicates the name of the scalar array used to compute the range.

IntVectorProperty.name: FieldType
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the field type of the selection.

IntVectorProperty.name: Component
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Select the component of the selection.

SourceProxy.name: SelectArraysExtractBlocks

Documentation.long_help: The SelectArraysExtractBlocks filter is a meta-filter combining the PassArray filter and the ExtractBlock filter.
Documentation.short_help: Combines the PassArray and the ExtractBlock filter.

SourceProxy.Documentation: The SelectArraysExtractBlocks filter is a meta-filter combining the PassArray filter and the ExtractBlock filter. It's intended to be used as a pre-processing filter for MultiBlockDataSet, UniformGridAMR and PartitionedDataSetCollection writers. It allows to select specific data arrays and/or blocks to write.

IntVectorProperty.name: ChooseArraysToWrite
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Explicitly choose which arrays to write.

StringVectorProperty.name: PointDataArrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Select the point data arrays to pass through.

StringVectorProperty.name: CellDataArrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Select the cell data arrays to pass through.

StringVectorProperty.name: FieldDataArrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Select the field data arrays to pass through.

StringVectorProperty.name: VertexDataArrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Select the vertex data arrays to pass through.

StringVectorProperty.name: EdgeDataArrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Select the edge data arrays to pass through.

StringVectorProperty.name: RowDataArrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Select the row data arrays to pass through.

IntVectorProperty.name: ChooseBlocksToWrite
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Explicitly choose which blocks to write.

StringVectorProperty.name: Assembly
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Select which assembly is used when specifying selectors to choose blocks to extract.

StringVectorProperty.name: Selectors
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify the selectors for the data assembly chosen using **Assembly** to choose the blocks to extract from the input dataset.

SourceProxy.label: Extract Cells Along Line
SourceProxy.name: ExtractCellsAlongLine
SourceProxy.Documentation: This filter extract the cells intersected by a line.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Point1
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: This property controls the coordinates of the first endpoint of the line.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Point2
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: This property controls the coordinates of the second endpoint of the line.

SourceProxy.label: Extract Cells Along Lines Custom Source
SourceProxy.name: ExtractCellsAlongLineCustom

Documentation.short_help: Extract cells along input lines from custom source

SourceProxy.Documentation: The Extract Cells Along Lines From Custom Source filter extracts cells from the input data set that intersect lines from a custom source. This source can be either an Unstructured Grid or a Poly Data. Any cells other than lines or poly lines are ignored in the source.

InputProperty.name: Source
InputProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the dataset composed of the lines and poly lines used to extract cells in the input.

SourceProxy.label: Extract Selection (internal)
SourceProxy.name: PVExtractSelection
SourceProxy.Documentation: This filter extracts a given set of cells or points given a selection. The selection can be obtained from a rubber-band selection (either point, cell, visible or in a frustum) and passed to the filter or specified by providing an ID list. This is an internal filter, use "ExtractSelection" instead.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: The input from which the selection is extracted.

InputProperty.name: Selection
InputProperty.Documentation: The input that provides the selection object.

IntVectorProperty.name: HyperTreeGridToUnstructuredGrid
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Output an unstructured grid instead of a hyper tree grid for input hyper tree grids.

SourceProxy.name: ConvertSelection
SourceProxy.Documentation: Converts a selection from one type to another.

InputProperty.name: DataInput
InputProperty.Documentation: Set the vtkDataObject input used to convert the selection.

IntVectorProperty.name: OutputType
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the ContentType for the output.

SourceProxy.label: Extract Selection
SourceProxy.name: ExtractSelection
SourceProxy.Documentation: This filter extracts a set of cells/points given a selection. The selection can be obtained from a rubber-band selection (either cell, visible or in a frustum) or threshold selection and passed to the filter or specified by providing an ID list.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the input from which the selection is extracted.

InputProperty.name: Selection
InputProperty.Documentation: The input that provides the selection object.

IntVectorProperty.name: PreserveTopology
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: If this property is set to 1 the output preserves the topology of its input and adds an insidedness array to mark which cells are inside or out. If 0 then the output is an unstructured grid which contains only the subset of cells that are inside.

IntVectorProperty.name: HyperTreeGridToUnstructuredGrid
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Output an unstructured grid instead of a hyper tree grid (for input hyper tree grids). Should not be changed after first execution.

WarnOnCreate.Text: **Extract Selection** filter will create an unstructured grid output and you may not have enough memory to create it. Do you want to continue?

SourceProxy.label: Extract Cells By Type
SourceProxy.name: ExtractCellsByType

Documentation.short_help: Extract cells based on their type.

SourceProxy.Documentation: This filter extracts cells of the selected types. If the data set does not contain cells of the chosen types, the output is empty.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the input of the filter.

StringVectorProperty.name: CellTypes
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Select the cell types to extract.

SourceProxy.name: AppendSelections

Documentation.short_help: Append multiple selections into one selection.

SourceProxy.Documentation: Append multiple selections with one or many nodes, with the same fieldType, and possibly different content type, to create a combined selection. Each selection has a name and a boolean expression can be set using the selection names to define the relation between the selections.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: This property indicates the inputs to the AppendSelections filter.

IntVectorProperty.name: AppendByUnion
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Allows by default to not append by union, so that an expression can be used.

StringVectorProperty.name: Expression
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the expression which defines the relation between the input selections.

IntVectorProperty.name: InsideOut
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When this property is false the selection describes everything that should be extracted. When this is true the selection describes everything that should NOT be extracted.

StringVectorProperty.name: SelectionNames
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify names to use for each input selection.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: SelectionColors
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify color to use for each input selection.

IntVectorProperty.name: ElementType
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Select the type of elements to select.

StringVectorProperty.name: Assembly
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Select which assembly is used when specify selectors to choose blocks to show for composite datasets.

StringVectorProperty.name: Selectors
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: For composite datasets, specify selectors to limit the view to a chosen subset of blocks.

IntVectorProperty.name: InsideOut
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When this property is false the selection describes everything that should be extracted. When this is true the selection describes everything that should NOT be extracted.

IntVectorProperty.name: ContainingCells
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When field type is POINT, this controls whether single vertex cells will be produced for each selected point, or whether the cells that contain each selected point will be produced. When field type is CELL this has no effect.

IntVectorProperty.name: NumberOfLayers
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify the number of layers of connected elements to include in the selection.

IntVectorProperty.name: RemoveSeed
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When using NumberOfLayers, this controls if the initial seed selection is remove or not. Default is false.

IntVectorProperty.name: RemoveIntermediateLayers
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When using NumberOfLayers, this controls if intermediate layers are removes or not. Default is false.

Proxy.name: SelectionSourceBase
Proxy.Documentation: Internal proxy used to define the common API for Selection Source proxies. Do not use.

IntVectorProperty.name: FieldType
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: The location of the array the selection came from (e.g. point, cell).

IntVectorProperty.name: ContainingCells
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When field type is POINT, this controls whether single vertex cells will be produced for each selected point, or whether the cells that contain each selected point will be produced. When field type is CELL this has no effect.

IntVectorProperty.name: InsideOut
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When this property is false the selection describes everything that should be extracted. When this is true the selection describes everything that should NOT be extracted.

IntVectorProperty.name: NumberOfLayers
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify the number of layers of connected elements to include in the selection.

IntVectorProperty.name: RemoveSeed
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When using NumberOfLayers, this controls if the initial seed selection is remove or not. Default is false.

IntVectorProperty.name: RemoveIntermediateLayers
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When using NumberOfLayers, this controls if intermediate layers are removes or not. Default is false.

SourceProxy.name: BlockSelectionSource
SourceProxy.Documentation: BlockSelectionSource is a source producing a block-based selection used to select blocks from a composite dataset.

IdTypeVectorProperty.label: Blocks
IdTypeVectorProperty.name: Blocks
IdTypeVectorProperty.Documentation: The list of blocks that will be added to the selection produced by the selection source. The blocks are identified using their composite index (flat index).

SourceProxy.name: BlockSelectorsSelectionSource
SourceProxy.Documentation: BlockSelectorsSelectionSource is a source producing a block-based selection used to select blocks from a composite dataset using selectors.

StringVectorProperty.label: Block Selectors
StringVectorProperty.name: BlockSelectors
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: The list of blocks selectors that will be added to the selection produced by the selection source.

SourceProxy.name: FrustumSelectionSource
SourceProxy.Documentation: FrustumSelectionSource is a source producing a frustum selection.

DoubleVectorProperty.label: Frustum
DoubleVectorProperty.name: Frustum
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Vertices that define a frustum for the selection source.

SourceProxy.name: GlobalIDSelectionSource
SourceProxy.Documentation: GlobalIDSelectionSource is a source producing a global ID based selection.

IdTypeVectorProperty.label: Global IDs
IdTypeVectorProperty.name: IDs
IdTypeVectorProperty.Documentation: The list of IDs that will be added to the selection produced by the selection source.

SourceProxy.name: PedigreeIDSelectionSource
SourceProxy.Documentation: PedigreeIDSelectionSource is a source producing a pedigree ID based selection.

StringVectorProperty.label: Pedigree IDs
StringVectorProperty.name: IDs
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: The list of integer IDs that will be added to the selection produced by the selection source, specified by the pair (domain, id).

StringVectorProperty.label: Pedigree String IDs
StringVectorProperty.name: StringIDs
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: The list of string IDs that will be added to the selection produced by the selection source, specified by the pair (domain, id).

SourceProxy.name: IDSelectionSource
SourceProxy.Documentation: IDSelectionSource is a source producing a ID based selection. This cannot be used for selecting composite datasets.

IdTypeVectorProperty.name: IDs
IdTypeVectorProperty.Documentation: The list of IDs that will be added to the selection produced by the selection source. This takes pairs of values as (process number, id).

SourceProxy.name: ValueSelectionSource
SourceProxy.Documentation: ValueSelectionSource is a source producing a value based selection. This cannot be used for selecting composite datasets.

IdTypeVectorProperty.name: Values
IdTypeVectorProperty.Documentation: The list of Values that will be added to the selection produced by the selection source. This takes pairs of values as (process number, value).

SourceProxy.name: CompositeDataIDSelectionSource
SourceProxy.Documentation: CompositeDataIDSelectionSource used to create an ID based selection for composite datasets (Multiblock or HierarchicalBox dataset).

IdTypeVectorProperty.name: IDs
IdTypeVectorProperty.Documentation: The list of IDs that will be added to the selection produced by the selection source. This takes 3-tuple of values as (flat-index, process number, id).

SourceProxy.name: HierarchicalDataIDSelectionSource
SourceProxy.Documentation: HierarchicalDataIDSelectionSource used to create an ID based selection for HierarchicalBox datasets.

IdTypeVectorProperty.name: IDs
IdTypeVectorProperty.Documentation: The list of IDs that will be added to the selection produced by the selection source. This takes 3-tuple of values as (level, index, id).

SourceProxy.name: ThresholdSelectionSource
SourceProxy.Documentation: ThresholdSelectionSource is used to create a threshold based selection.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Thresholds
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The list of thresholds that will be added to the selection produced by the selection source.

StringVectorProperty.name: ArrayName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: For threshold and value selection, this controls the name of the scalar array that will be thresholded within.

SourceProxy.name: LocationSelectionSource
SourceProxy.Documentation: LocationSelectionSource is used to create a location based selection.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Locations
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The list of locations that will be added to the selection produced by the selection source.
